Layout.name: Layout
Layout.description:
Pass width and height parameters;
or just already existing ImageData as source.

throws.description: Raise an error if data size larger than the size of the MAX_BUFFER_SIZE.

props.name: source
props.description: Specify other buffer or a size (without offset)

classitems.description: Type of an array that uses by ImageData. Depends on browser.
classitems.name: ImageDataArray

classitems.description: Is API supported on current browser.
classitems.name: isSupported

classitems.description: More safest and fastest method to create ImageData.
classitems.name: createImageData

classitems.description: Clamp a number according to min-max borders.
classitems.name: clamp

classitems.description: More safest and fastest method to create canvas elements.
classitems.name: createCanvas

classitems.description: Floating point error for comparison method.
Return string is JSON format.
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description:
Add two Vector2 instances;
or add Vector2 instance with numbers.
classitems.name: add

classitems.description:
Substract one Vector2 instance from another;
or substrast number from Vector2 instance.
classitems.name: sub

classitems.description:
Multiply two Vector2 instances;
or multiply Vector2 instance by numbers.
classitems.name: mul

classitems.description:
Divide one Vector2 instance by another;
or divide Vector2 instance by numbers.
classitems.name: div

classitems.description:
Copy Vector2 instance;
or set new values for Vector2 instance.
classitems.name: set

classitems.description:
Compare two Vector2 instances
or compare Vector2 instance properties with numbers.
classitems.name: cmp

classitems.description: Make Vector2 instance properties absolute.
classitems.name: abs

classitems.description: Make Vector2 instance properties negative.
classitems.name: neg

classitems.description: Swap properties between Vector2 instances.
classitems.name: swap

classitems.description: Round down Vector2 instance properties.
classitems.name: floor

classitems.description: Round up Vector2 instance properties.
classitems.name: ceil

classitems.description: Round Vector2 instance properties.
classitems.name: round

classitems.description: Check properties for NaN.
classitems.name: hasNaN

classitems.description: Check properties for Infinity.
classitems.name: hasInfinity

classitems.description: Make new Vector2 instance with same properties.
classitems.name: clone

params.name: method
params.description: [out] The method to execute when event is fired.

params.name: method
params.description: [in] Have to be same reference that passed in subscribe method.

classitems.description: Ellipse inside rectangle.
classitems.name: ellipse

classitems.description:
Simple factory-like method
Take care about view creating and DOM manipulations
Also put new instance into static "instances" list
classitems.name: create

props.name: element
props.description: The canvas for drawing, or other element as parent.

props.name: source
props.description: New instance will listen all changes on source.

classitems.description: List of all existing View instances.
classitems.name: instances

classitems.description: Reference onto the currently active view instance.
classitems.name: activeView

classitems.description: Clear canvas and update imageData and draw.
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Draw rectangle at canvas element directly.
classitems.name: drawRect

classitems.description: Just redraw from old/previous imageData condition.
classitems.name: redraw

classitems.description: Clear canvas element directly.
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: Update the buffer from layout (model).
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: Transform canvas according to scale & translate.
classitems.name: begin

classitems.description: Restore context.
classitems.name: end

classitems.description: Change current scale rate value.
classitems.name: setScale

classitems.description: Transform position according to the current scale offset.
classitems.name: fitToTransition

classitems.description: Resize and redraw.
classitems.name: resizeElement

classitems.description: Listen for events that fired when layout (model) has been changed.
classitems.name: _subscribe

classitems.description: Stop listen the layout (model) changes.
classitems.name: _unsubscribe

classitems.description: Destructor.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Maximum number of layers per layout.
classitems.name: MAX_LAYER_COUNT

classitems.description: Model event name.
classitems.name: PIXELS_CHANGED_EVENT

classitems.description:
Append new Layer instance into the layerList (if possible);
activeLayer point on new instance.
classitems.name: appendLayer

classitems.description: Delete an active layer.
classitems.name: deleteLayer

classitems.description:
Each visible layer "drawn" to main dataLayer layer (Back-to-front);
Notify subscribers.
classitems.name: mergeLayers

classitems.description:
Replace old colour by new one;
delegate processing to the activeLayer.
classitems.name: colorReplace

classitems.description:
Set pixel or group of pixels (force-fill);
delegate processing to the activeLayer.
classitems.name: set

classitems.description:
Setting the value for specific channel;
delegate processing to the activeLayer.
classitems.name: setChannel

classitems.description:
Flood fill;
delegate processing to the activeLayer.
classitems.name: fill

classitems.description: Provide an index from position.
classitems.name: indexAt

classitems.description: Provide position according to index (without offset).
classitems.name: positionFrom

classitems.description: Get whole image data or just a part of it (according to options).
classitems.name: getImageData

classitems.description: Warn: for internal usage only!
classitems.name: __process

classitems.description: Destructor.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Strict limitation, but that's enough for pixel-art
classitems.name: MAX_BUFFER_SIZE

classitems.description: Reset the data to default.
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: Warn: Make sure layers have same size before call this.
classitems.name: copy

classitems.description:
Merge each pixel of two layers;
Or apply merging to pixels within start and offset options.
classitems.name: merge

classitems.description:
Replace specific color from position with new one on whole layer;
Or just on area within start and offset options.
classitems.name: colorReplace

classitems.description:
Set new color for layer;
Or just for area within start and offset options.
classitems.name: set

classitems.description:
Change specific channel for layer;
Or channel for area within start and offset options.
classitems.name: setChannel

classitems.description:
Flood fill (no recursion, custom stack);
Can be applyed for area within start and offset options.
classitems.name: fill

classitems.description: Warn: index without color-offset!
classitems.name: pixelFromIndex

classitems.description: Index with color-offset (which equal to x4 (rgba)).
classitems.name: pixelAt

classitems.description: Destructor.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Point on the current index in container
classitems.name: _pointer

classitems.description: Start Layer recording.
classitems.name: rec

throws.description: Raise an error if already is under recording.

classitems.description: Stop recording and save session.
classitems.name: stop

classitems.description: Remove sessions with deleted/empty layers.
classitems.name: clean

classitems.description:
Have to be called once, before started color processing;
Only for operations with single color.
classitems.name: initColor

classitems.description: It is recommended to use this during processing multiple colors.
classitems.name: pushPixel

classitems.description: Only for operations with single color. Used only after initColor() method.
classitems.name: pushIndex
